gw.api.admin

Class MessagingUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.admin.MessagingUtil

  • public class MessagingUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides utility functions supporting messaging admin screens.
    Author:
    cgross

    • Method Detail

      • getMessage

        public static Message getMessage(java.lang.Long messageId)
        Looks up a message object based on the supplied ID.
        Parameters:
        messageId - the id of message to get
        Returns:
        The retrieved message

      • getEventMessages

        public static EventMessage[] getEventMessages(java.lang.Long sooKeyValue)
        Find all messages related to the safe ordering object (e.g. claim) identified by sooKeyValue. If the sooKeyValue is negative, all messages that are unrelated to any safe ordering object are returned.
        Parameters:
        sooKeyValue - the id of safe ordered value
        Returns:
        array of message dto objects

      • getEventMessageDestinationMap

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> getEventMessageDestinationMap()
        Returns a map of destination to destination name
        Returns:
        the map of destination to name

      • getEventMessagesForDestination

        public static EventMessage[] getEventMessagesForDestination(java.lang.Integer destId,
                                            java.lang.Long sooKeyValue)
        Deprecated. use method returning query
        Returns all messages for the specified destination and the safe ordering object (e.g. claim) identified by sooKeyValue. If the sooKeyValue is negative, all messages that are unrelated to any safe ordering object and targeted at the destination are returned.
        Parameters:
        destId - the destination maybe null
        sooKeyValue - the id of safe ordered value
        Returns:
        array of message dto objects

      • getEventMessagesForDestination

        public static IQueryBeanResult<Message> getEventMessagesForDestination(java.lang.Integer destId,
                                                       java.lang.Long sooKeyValue,
                                                       int chunkSize)
        Returns all messages for the specified destination and the safe ordering object (e.g. claim) identified by sooKeyValue. If the sooKeyValue is negative, all messages that are unrelated to any safe ordering object and targeted at the destination are returned.
        Parameters:
        destId - the destination maybe null
        sooKeyValue - the id of safe ordered value
        chunkSize - this is a database chunksize, it is used to define how many records are returned in each chunk. If you are doing paging you may want to use the number of rows as this value, it is still upto the caller to limit the number of 'next' calls if they only want that number of rows.
        Returns:
        a query over messages

      • skipMessages

        public static void skipMessages(EventMessage[] messages)
        Deprecated. use the MessageBase version instead
        Skips all of the specified messages. The messages will be removed from the send queue and not dispatched.
        Parameters:
        messages - array of message dto objects

      • skipMessages

        public static void skipMessages(Message[] messages)
        Skips all of the specified messages. The messages will be removed from the send queue and not dispatched.
        Parameters:
        messages - to be skipped

      • retryMessagesForStats

        public static void retryMessagesForStats(SafeOrderedObjectMessageStatistics[] stats)
        Retries the specified messages (extracting the message ids from the supplied statistics objects).
        Parameters:
        stats - the array of destination and safe order objects to retry

      • retryBlockingMessageForPrimaryObject

        public static void retryBlockingMessageForPrimaryObject(int destinationID,
                                        int primaryObjectKey)
        Retries a message in error status for the specified destination and primary object (such as a claim).
        Parameters:
        destinationID - the destination
        primaryObjectKey - the id of safe ordered value

      • retryRetryableMessages

        public static void retryRetryableMessages(EventMessage[] messages)
        Deprecated. used the message array one
        Retries all messages in retryable state. This should be used for cross-primary objects.
        Parameters:
        messages - to be retried

      • retryRetryableMessages

        public static void retryRetryableMessages(Message[] messages)
        Retries all messages in retryable state. This should be used for cross-primary objects.
        Parameters:
        messages - to be retried

      • skipBlockingMessagesForStats

        public static void skipBlockingMessagesForStats(SafeOrderedObjectMessageStatistics[] stats)
        Skips any messages in error status for the specified primary objects (extracted from the provided array of statistics objects).
        Parameters:
        stats - the array of destination and safe order objects to skip

      • resyncPrimaryObjectForStats

        public static void resyncPrimaryObjectForStats(SafeOrderedObjectMessageStatistics[] stats)
        Drops all pending messages and generates a resync event for each of the primary objects identified by the supplied array of statistics objects.
        Parameters:
        stats - the array of destination and safe order objects to resync

      • resyncPrimaryObject

        public static void resyncPrimaryObject(int destinationID,
                       int primaryObjectKey)
        Drops all pending messages and generates a resync event for the specified destination and primary object.
        Parameters:
        destinationID - the destination
        primaryObjectKey - the id of safe ordered value

      • restartMessageEngine

        public static void restartMessageEngine()
        Restarts the messaging system, reloading all pending messages from the database.

      • isEventRegisteredForDestination

        public static boolean isEventRegisteredForDestination(int destinationID,
                                      java.lang.String eventName)
        Determines if event is registered for the destination.
        Parameters:
        destinationID - the destination
        eventName - the event name
        Returns:
        true if the event is registered for the destination, false otherwise.

      • resumeDestinations

        public static void resumeDestinations(DestinationMessageStatistics[] dests)
        Resumes message sending to suspended destinations in the supplied array of destinations.
        Parameters:
        dests - the destinations to resume

      • restartDestinations

        public static void restartDestinations(DestinationMessageStatistics[] dests,
                       int timeToTryInSecs)
        Restart message destinations in the supplied array of destinations.
        Parameters:
        dests - the destinations to restart
        timeToTryInSecs - how long to wait

      • suspendDestinations

        Suspend message sending to the specified destinations.
        Parameters:
        dests - the destinations to suspend

      • removeMessageHistory

        public static void removeMessageHistory(java.util.Date before)
        Remove all messages in the message history table that are older than the specified date.
        Parameters:
        before - the cutoff date for which all messages that are older than this date are deleted.
